title: Ticket #7509: Add efficient querying of LSF job statuses to the blahp
description:
The blahp was previously enhanced to efficiently query the current status of PBS and SLURM jobs. When the status of one job is requested, the status script queries the status of all jobs and persistently stores the results. Subsequent requests for job status can used the stashed results if they're recent enough.

The Pegasus group has developed the same enhancement for LSF jobs, and would like to contribute it to the blahp codebase.

Details about the code can be found here in the Pegasus tracking system: https://jira.isi.edu/browse/PM-1395
